scripts.export-db: docker exec $(docker ps -lq) /bin/bash -c "sudo -u www-data wp db export /data/database.sql"
scripts.import-db: docker exec $(docker ps -lq) /bin/bash -c "sudo -u www-data wp db import /data/database.sql" && npm run search-replace
scripts.update-plugins: docker exec $(docker ps -lq) /bin/bash -c "sudo -u www-data wp plugin update --all"
scripts.update-themes: docker exec $(docker ps -lq) /bin/bash -c "sudo -u www-data wp theme update --all"
scripts.plugin-install: docker exec $(docker ps -lq) /bin/bash -c "sudo -u www-data wp plugin install $PLUGIN"
scripts.plugin-update: docker exec $(docker ps -lq) /bin/bash -c "sudo -u www-data wp plugin update $PLUGIN"
scripts.theme-update: docker exec $(docker ps -lq) /bin/bash -c "sudo -u www-data wp theme update $THEME"
scripts.theme-install: docker exec $(docker ps -lq) /bin/bash -c "sudo -u www-data wp theme install $THEME"
scripts.search-replace: docker exec $(docker ps -lq) /bin/bash -c "sudo -u www-data wp search-replace 'http://www.oldurl.com' 'http://localhost:8080' --skip-columns=guid"
